title: Trump is dealt another defeat on travel ban as U.S. appeals court in Virginia blocks enforcement
text: Although the decision was another sweeping defeat for the president and his lawyers, it clears the way for them to take the issue to the Supreme Court, where a conservative majority gives them a better chance of prevailing. The procedural status of the case could allow the high court to hear at least a partial appeal rapidly, perhaps this spring.
summary:
Although the decision was another sweeping defeat for the president and his lawyers, it clears the way for them to take the issue to the Supreme Court, where a conservative majority gives them a better chance of prevailing.
The procedural status of the case could allow the high court to hear at least a partial appeal rapidly, perhaps this spring.
